hero.title: Medical documentation
hero.subtitle: Built for the complexity of hospital care.

soapDemo.soapS: Patient reports persistent headache for 3 days, worsening in the evening. Rates pain 6/10, bilateral pressure. Denies nausea or photophobia.
soapDemo.soapO: BP 120/80, HR 72, Temp 36.8°C. Alert and oriented. Mild trapezius tenderness bilaterally. CN II-XII intact.
soapDemo.soapA: Tension-type headache, likely stress-related. No red flags for secondary headache.
soapDemo.soapP: Ibuprofen 400mg PRN. Sleep hygiene counseling. Follow-up in 2 weeks if no improvement.
soapDemo.phoneSoapO: BP 120/80, HR 72. Trapezius tenderness. CN intact.

features.title: Adaptable to all administrative tasks
features.subtitle: All the tools you need to speed up your documentation

recording.title: Smart Recording
recording.description: Record consultations with one tap. Our AI understands medical context and filters background noise.

transcription.title: Accurate Transcription
transcription.description: Real-time transcription with 99% accuracy for medical terminology in multiple languages.

summaries.title: Structured Summaries
summaries.description: Automatically generate medical visit notes, discharge letters, and consultation reports.

integration.title: EHR Integration
integration.description: Seamlessly integrate with your existing Electronic Health Record system.

security.title: Data Security
security.description: Your data stays in Switzerland. HIPAA compliant, ISO 27001 certified.

languages.title: Multilingual Support
languages.description: Supports German, French, Italian, English, and 20+ other languages.

specialties.title: Supporting 50+ medical specialties
specialties.subtitle: From general practice to specialized care

testimonials.title: Loved by doctors
testimonials.subtitle: See what healthcare professionals say about DocNote
testimonials.quote1: DocNote has really changed my day in the emergency department, allowing me to concentrate on my patients and enjoy my consultations once again.
testimonials.quote2: Since I started using DocNote, preparing and following up consultations has become a quick and efficient process.
testimonials.quote3: I always said I'd pay for a full-time assistant when I became a billionaire, but now I don't even need to be a billionaire.

cta.title: Ready to save 2+ hours daily?
cta.subtitle: Join hundreds of doctors who have transformed their documentation workflow.

valueProp.title: Streamlined Medical Documentation
valueProp.subtitle: Unify your documentation workflow, save hours every day, and focus on what matters most — your patients.

card1.title: Get up and running fast
card1.description: Start instantly. Any doctor on your team can record, transcribe, and share clinical notes in minutes.

card2.title: Sync across your EHR
card2.description: Unify your tools. Connect data from anywhere with seamless EHR integrations and automated workflows.

card3.title: Seamless across devices
card3.description: Stay connected, wherever you work. DocNote runs effortlessly on any device — mobile, tablet, or desktop.

compliance.title: Security tailored to medical requirements
compliance.subtitle: Our infrastructure complies with high data protection standards, specifically tailored to the requirements of the medical sector.
compliance.cardDescription: DocNote implements enterprise-grade security with end-to-end encryption, strict access controls, and comprehensive audit logging to protect sensitive patient data.
compliance.protocolEncryption: End-to-end encryption: TLS 1.3 (in transit) & AES-256 (at rest)

swiss.title: Swiss Hosting
swiss.description: All data stored exclusively on Swiss servers, ensuring full compliance with local healthcare regulations.

hipaa.title: HIPAA Compliant
hipaa.description: Fully compliant with healthcare privacy standards, ensuring patient data protection at every level.

iso.title: ISO 27001
iso.description: Certified information security management with regular audits and continuous monitoring.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Most of the users ask these questions. Need help?
faq.q1: How does DocNote ensure data security?
faq.a1: We use advanced encryption protocols and process information on secure servers, located in Switzerland, thus ensuring maximum protection.
faq.q2: Is DocNote compatible with all medical systems?
faq.a2: Yes, DocNote is designed to adapt to a variety of medical environments, including practice management software and electronic medical record systems.
faq.q3: Can I use DocNote on several devices?
faq.a3: Absolutely, DocNote is accessible on tablets and smartphones, allowing you to manage your reports wherever you are.
faq.q4: Does DocNote offer a trial period?
faq.a4: Yes, we offer a 30-consultation trial period so you can test all the features and see the improvements in managing your medical reports.

footer.description: AI-powered medical documentation for hospital workflows.

pricing.title: From solo clinicians to large organisations
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your practice

professional.name: Cabinets and individual physicians
professional.description: For individual doctors and small practices
features: Possible integration by the DocNote team

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How does the free trial work?
faq.a1: Start with 30 free consultations with full access to Professional features. No credit card required.
faq.a2: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect at your next billing cycle.
faq.a3: Absolutely. All data is encrypted and stored in Switzerland. We are HIPAA compliant and ISO 27001 certified.
faq.q4: Which EHR systems do you integrate with?
faq.a4: We integrate with most major EHR systems including Epic, Cerner, and local Swiss systems like Sokle or Mediway.

tutorial.title: Getting Started with DocNote
tutorial.subtitle: Follow these simple steps to transform your medical documentation workflow

step1.title: Download the Mobile Application, or connect to the Web App
step1.description: Download the DocNote mobile application from your phone's app store, or access it directly via our web app:

step2.title: Create Your Account
step2.description: Create your account by entering your professional email. We will send you an activation code.
step2.trialInfo: Your 30-consultation trial will start once you receive and enter your activation code.

step3.title: Main Screen
step3.description: Start using our solution to improve your administrative burden and begin to enjoy your work again. You can watch the tutorial below to help you understand our main features.
step3.chooseModel: From the landing page, you can select the report model that best suits your needs:

general.title: General Practitioner Consultation
general.description: Concise, clinically structured notes designed for primary care

specialist.title: Specialist Consultation
specialist.description: Detailed specialist consultation structured as a formal letter to the referring doctor

followUp.title: Medical Visit Follow-up Notes
followUp.description: Standardized daily progress notes for hospitalized patients

discharge.title: Discharge Letter
discharge.description: Consolidated discharge summary integrating all documents created during hospitalization
